entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
